name: HELIOS
description: Helios (HLX) is an erc20 utility token on the Ethereum blockchain designed to revolutionize cryptocurrency mining by integrating the TitanX protocol, a system known for its supply reduction and buy pressure mechanisms. Helios operates with similar mechanics as TitanX, except it uses TITANX, instead of ETH, for mining operations, offering a unique approach to cryptocurrency engagement and asset growth.
